short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing a straightforward note-keeping extension developed by KCB.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing a straightforward note-keeping extension developed by KCB. Simply select any text within your browser, right-click, and choose 'Keep in My Note' from the Context Menu.  A popup will appear where you can add a title or have it automatically generated from the selected text. Click 'Save' to store the note. To view your notes later, click on the extension icon and select 'View Notes' to see all your saved notes.
